channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Dozens of monkeys escape from South Carolina research facility
item.description: More than 40 monkeys are now roaming the streets of Yemassee, S.C., after staging an escape from a research facility.
item.content:encoded:
More than 40 monkeys are now roaming the streets of Yemassee, S.C., after staging an escape from a research facility.

(Image credit: Carrie Antlfinger)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: Donald Trump has chosen Susie Wiles to serve as his chief of staff
item.description: A longtime veteran of Florida politics, Wiles served as a senior staffer on Trump's campaign, helping guide his path to victory. She will be the first female chief of staff in U.S. history.
item.content:encoded:
A longtime veteran of Florida politics, Wiles served as a senior staffer on Trump's campaign, helping guide his path to victory. She will be the first female chief of staff in U.S. history.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordoñez

item.title: TB reclaims title of deadliest infectious disease. That's an 'outrage' says WHO
item.description: DIslodged by COVID early in the pandemic, tuberculosis is once again the infectious disease that takes the most lives each year. And the number of cases set a new record. What's going on?
item.content:encoded:
DIslodged by COVID early in the pandemic, tuberculosis is once again the infectious disease that takes the most lives each year. And the number of cases set a new record. What's going on?

(Image credit: Punit Paranjpe/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Fran Kritz

item.title: Asheville radio reporter covers Helene's impact for Spanish-speaking communities
item.description: Nearly six weeks after Hurricane Helene slammed into Western North Carolina, radio reporter Jose Sandoval's daily Spanish-language broadcasts have become an essential lifeline for the small but growing Latino community in Western North Carolina, providing information about public services and dispelling misinformation as they piece together their lives.
item.content:encoded:
Nearly six weeks after Hurricane Helene slammed into Western North Carolina, radio reporter Jose Sandoval's daily Spanish-language broadcasts have become an essential lifeline for the small but growing Latino community in Western North Carolina, providing information about public services and dispelling misinformation as they piece together their lives.

(Image credit: Gerard Albert III/BPR)
item.dc:creator: Rolando Arrieta

item.title: Who will control the House? It’s down to these uncalled races
item.description: Control of the House is still too close to call, according to the Associated Press. Here's a running list of races that are still outstanding.
item.content:encoded: Control of the House is still too close to call, according to the Associated Press. Here's a running list of races that are still outstanding.
item.dc:creator: Hilary Fung

item.title: David McCormick ousts Democratic incumbent Bob Casey to win Pennsylvania Senate race
item.description: With McCormick's victory, Republicans have expanded their Senate majority in the next Congress to 53 seats, with two races still to be called.
item.content:encoded:
With McCormick's victory, Republicans have expanded their Senate majority in the next Congress to 53 seats, with two races still to be called.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Susan Davis

item.title: Putin congratulates Trump and says he's 'ready' to engage in dialogue
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory, saying he is ready to engage with the United States.
item.content:encoded:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has congratulated Donald Trump on his election victory, saying he is ready to engage with the United States.

(Image credit: Maxim Shipenkov)
item.dc:creator: Charles Maynes

item.title: With Trump’s win, Elon Musk stands to benefit
item.description: The billionaire businessman has spent weeks campaigning relentlessly for Donald Trump. That dedication could lead to major benefits for him and his companies.
item.content:encoded:
The billionaire businessman has spent weeks campaigning relentlessly for Donald Trump. That dedication could lead to major benefits for him and his companies.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Dara Kerr

item.title: White House advisor Neera Tanden faces Hatch Act complaint over tweets
item.description: In 2021, Tanden was nominated to lead the Office of Management and Budget, but she withdrew her nomination after coming under fire from members of Congress.
item.content:encoded:
In 2021, Tanden was nominated to lead the Office of Management and Budget, but she withdrew her nomination after coming under fire from members of Congress.

(Image credit: Win McNamee)
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: Trump’s win could accelerate the privatization of Medicare
item.description: The former president's pending return to the White House could alter the very nature of Medicare, the nearly 60-year-old federal health care program.
item.content:encoded:
The former president's pending return to the White House could alter the very nature of Medicare, the nearly 60-year-old federal health care program.

(Image credit: Jenny Kane)
item.dc:creator: Stephanie Armour
